actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Specialty Crops and Foreign Agriculture Programs
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Specialty Crops and Foreign Agriculture Programs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Specialty Crops and Foreign Agriculture Programs

official_title: To terminate the price support and marketing quota programs for peanuts.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Market Transition Act to terminate the peanut price support program.Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to terminate the peanut marketing quota program.Prohibits the Secretary of Agriculture from making price supports available for the 2001 and subsequent peanut crops.

titles.title: To terminate the price support and marketing quota programs for peanuts.
